content:
CompSci 269S, Spring 2008: Theory Seminar

The Theory Group meets Fridays at 1:00pm; this quarter we are in Bren Hall, room 1423. Below is this quarter's schedule.

Apr 4: Organizational Meeting
Apr 18: Nodari Sitchinava, Graph Algorithms in PEM: Part II
Apr 25: Nate Gertsch, Finding Optimal Refueling Policies in Transportation Networks
May 9: Kevin Wortman, Offline Variants of the "Lion and Man" Problem
Jun 6: Darren Strash, A Randomized Algorithm for Constructing the Trapezoidal Map Induced by a Connected Geometric Graph

Previous quarters' theory seminars
